TopicTitle: Recruit for the KSP reporting in for first day on the Job.

Articles.Content:
Evening guys, Grim here, hailing from the fair town of Leicester, Great Britain. I heard the Kerbals could use an extra hand in conquering the use of Rockets, so I thought "How hard can it be?" and decided to come help them out.

In all seriousness, Kerbal Space Program is brilliant, I really like this game, mostly because you can build ridiculous contraptions that are even more explodey than the Russian Moon Rocket.

Gotta say though, Would love to see an N-1 explode.

Hi GrimJr789, welcome to the community

I tried to find you a decent vid of the N1 going bang but it seems it's hard to find (for me anyway), you can aways simulate it in KSP though, it wouldn't be hard
